General.Name: Mobeus Income And Growth 2 Vct Plc
General.Description: Mobeus Income & Growth 2 VCT Plc is a venture capital trust specializing in venture capital, private equity, management buyouts in the small to medium-sized unquoted and AIM listed companies operating in the Internet software and e-business, information technology, telecommunications, and media sectors. It invests in companies based in the United Kingdom. The fund prefers to take the majority stakes. The fund structures its investments as part equity and part loan.
